name: gorby's mod
description:
welcome to gorby's mod

ANNOUNCMENT : WE ARE NO LONGER IN NEXTBOT DEMO! BUILDING LIKE MINECRAFT WAS ADDED IN VERSION 0.99, ALONG WITH COMBAT IN 1.0!!!

note : game is in final version (1.0) so probably wont be recieving any more updates unless i need to fix bugs or i have a really really really good idea

this is the first demo that includes :

  • 8 10 nextbots (press q while in game) (10 in the new update)
  • multiplayer (when starting up game just enter room name and press "Start Shared Client" idk how to remove the rest of the buttons but that one works)
  • a crowbar that makes funny noises
  • flashlight
  • scary mode
  • all the sound effects are hd totally original and not valve audio
  • one map (gm_construct_but_bad_and_also_bigger) (will be biggerer in future)
  • a few secrets
  • yellow face from bfdi
  • objectively better dark room (is in the update!!)

here are some public server room names (no different from private but everyone knows these so you could join and see people you dont even know)

  • public1
  • public2
  • public3
